title: 測試課文 - Cricket and Baseball

paragraphs.text: Mika's cousin Abha is visiting from India. Jerry lives next door. Abha: Who plays cricket, anyone? Mika: You mean baseball. Abha: No, I mean cricket. Don't you know cricket? Mika: Don't you know baseball? Jerry: Let's learn both!
paragraphs.summary: Mika、Abha 和 Jerry 討論板球和棒球的差異。

paragraphs.text: Cricket is popular in many countries. India, England, Australia, and Pakistan all love cricket. In cricket, players use a flat bat. The ball is hard and red. Players wear white clothes.
paragraphs.summary: 板球在許多國家很受歡迎，包括印度、英國、澳洲和巴基斯坦。

choices.question: 哪個國家不在文中提到喜歡板球？

paragraphs.text: Baseball is America's favorite sport. It's also popular in Japan, Korea, and Taiwan. Baseball players use a round bat. The ball is white with red stitches. Players wear colorful uniforms.
paragraphs.summary: 棒球是美國最受歡迎的運動，在日本、韓國和台灣也很流行。

cloze.question: 棒球在哪個亞洲國家很流行？請寫出一個。
